# Spec: add-mermaidjs-v11-skill

## Overview

- Purpose: Add the upstream mermaidjs-v11 skill into the Vibe Flow skill suite and ensure it is installable and discoverable.
- Goals & success criteria:
  - The mermaidjs-v11 skill exists under .github/skills/ with full upstream content.
  - [install-vibeflow.md](install-vibeflow.md) includes fetch + verification steps for this skill.
  - The skill is discoverable in [vibe-flow.agent.md](.github/agents/vibe-flow.agent.md) and documentation reflects availability.

## Design

- Architecture:
  - New skill directory: .github/skills/mermaidjs-v11/
  - Required files:
    - .github/skills/mermaidjs-v11/SKILL.md (upstream content, with frontmatter intact)
    - .github/skills/mermaidjs-v11/references/diagram-types.md
    - .github/skills/mermaidjs-v11/references/configuration.md
    - .github/skills/mermaidjs-v11/references/cli-usage.md
    - .github/skills/mermaidjs-v11/references/integration.md
    - .github/skills/mermaidjs-v11/references/examples.md
  - No scripts/ assets required per upstream skill.
- APIs & interfaces:
  - Update <available_skills> in [vibe-flow.agent.md](.github/agents/vibe-flow.agent.md) with the mermaidjs-v11 entry using the upstream description and location.
  - Update [install-vibeflow.md](install-vibeflow.md) Step 7.2 “Fetch Skills” to include the new skill files from this repository’s raw URLs.
  - Update Step 7.3 verification list to include the new skill paths.
  - If a skills manifest is introduced later, add an entry for mermaidjs-v11 (name, source, version/commit, installedAt). (Optional unless maintainers decide to add .github/skills/skills-manifest.json now.)

## Constraints

- Licensing: Upstream repo does not expose a license file; confirm allowable use or add attribution if required.
- No code execution dependencies: Skill content is documentation-only, but references mention Node.js >=18.19 for CLI use.
- Scope: Do not modify agent logic beyond skill metadata updates.

## Acceptance Criteria

- All required mermaidjs-v11 files exist under .github/skills/.
- [install-vibeflow.md](install-vibeflow.md) includes installation and verification steps for mermaidjs-v11.
- [vibe-flow.agent.md](.github/agents/vibe-flow.agent.md) lists mermaidjs-v11 under <available_skills>.
- Documentation mentions the new skill (e.g., README skills section or a new docs/vibeflow/mermaidjs-v11-skill.md).

## Deliverables

- New skill folder + reference files (listed above).
- Updated [install-vibeflow.md](install-vibeflow.md).
- Updated [vibe-flow.agent.md](.github/agents/vibe-flow.agent.md) skill list.
- Documentation update (README or new doc file under docs/vibeflow/).
- Optional: .github/skills/skills-manifest.json entry if adopted.
